subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Deaths (Obituaries)
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Mr. Miller, who trained champion thoroughbred horses for nearly half a century, saddled the 1993 Kentucky Derby winner, Sea Hero, at the age of 71.
snippet: Mr. Miller, who trained champion thoroughbred horses for nearly half a century, saddled the 1993 Kentucky Derby winner, Sea Hero, at the age of 71.
